markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 18"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Mighty Wings](/Feats.aspx?ID=3409) <actions string="" />
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 79</row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940); [_dragon wings_](/Spells.aspx?ID=501) sorcerer bloodline spell

</column>

---

Your dragon wings are now a permanent part of your body, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. If you spend 1 Focus Point to cast _dragon wings_, your fly Speed increases to 90 feet for the duration, unless your Speed is faster, and you gain the effects of [_dragon claws_](/Spells.aspx?ID=500) for the duration.

<title level="2">Bloodsalt Dragon Disciple Feats</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 79</row>

The following archetype feats are for the dragon disciple archetype. You must take the Dragon Disciple Dedication feat before selecting any of these feats, and you must select cloud dragon (which is associated with the electricity energy type) as the type of dragon you've studied. The feats below are dragon disciple archetype feats. By studying the ruins (see the AP for full details), you gain access to the dragon disciple archetype and to these feats

 If you have the [draconic sorcerer](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=5) bloodline, you must choose cloud dragon as your dragon type. This choice affects the [_dragon breath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=499) and [_dragon claws_](/Spells.aspx?ID=500) bloodline spells and several of the feats below.

**Related Feats**: [Cloud Walk](/Feats.aspx?ID=3406), [Deflecting Cloud](/Feats.aspx?ID=3408), [Shape of the Cloud Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=3407)
name: Mighty Wings
prerequisite: Dragon Disciple Dedication; _dragon wings_ sorcerer bloodline spell
